oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Prisoner of war ledger book kept by Lt. Col. P. Lynch Lee at Johnson's Island Prison, OH
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Prisoner of war ledger kept by Lt. Col. Lee, 15th Arkansas Regiment at Johnson's Island Prison, Sandusky, Ohio. Ledger shows names, addresses, and unit affiliations of dozens of Confederate prisoners, including several Tennesseans. Lee was from Camden, AK
